评论详情: Excellent and elevated gift (for self or another). A Classic since Animal House! Humor abounds- as does comfort. Size was perfectly roomy. Tons of compliments! and inquiries about where I got it!
I had to have this and the shirt didn’t disappoint. Very soft and comfy
Font is way too big which doesn’t really come through in pictures. But comfy shirt nonetheless
Not just pre washed but so faded it was hard to see.

Going back to college at age 52 to local community college.  Got this for my days on campus…makes me feel “in”, even though I’m usually the oldest in my classes! Cute tshirt. Not super soft or slimming-so just expect a regular old cotton tshirt.
Lettering has just about gone away after 6 or 7 months.
We are big Animal House fans.  This is soooo subtle...most people don't get it, only Animal House fans
This is a great shirt I bought for my son the only problem was it was a little short.
I’m bigger so I look for shirts I can stretch a little.  This one did not but a good T-shirt if weari g around the house or under something.  Ripped in the collar when I tried to stretch it.
The beginning C and the ending E are under my arms. Looks funky.

This T-Shirt is simply the greatest Homage to the late great John Belushi in "Animal House."  Fans of that movie should remember that he wore a T-shirt that simply said "COLLEGE."  So when I saw the same type of shirt on Amazon, knew I had to get it, and got it.  Have worn it only a couple times, but each time, people recognized the connection to Belushi, and said, Way to Go, Cool Belushi Animal House shirt!
Very high quality.  Feminine fit, but not tight.

The shirt is fine, for the most part. However, at some point prior to packaging the shirt, someone got ink hand-prints on the back of the shirt. I do not feel like going through the hassle of packaging and returning the shirt, so I am going to wash it, and hope for the best. Ultimately, it is just very disappointing.
